functional_units.name: BoxHeader memberwise initializer exposure
functional_units.description: Exposes BoxHeader's memberwise initializer to allow SwiftUI previews to compile in ISOInspectorApp.

functional_units.name: ParseTree preview data coverage
functional_units.description: Ensures preview sample snapshots build valid headers from outside the Kit module.

functional_units.name: Random-access payload annotation provider
functional_units.description: Provides annotations for ftyp and mvhd field ranges, enabling UI highlights with regression coverage.

functional_units.name: Detail pane refresh
functional_units.description: Lists selectable annotations and renders a synchronized hex grid with interactive byte selection.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeDetailViewModel orchestration
functional_units.description: Orchestrates annotation loading, selection state, and highlighted ranges shared with the hex viewer.
